amendment.description: An amendment numbered 59 printed in House Report 118-142 to prohibit the use of RDT&E funding on electric vehicles, electric vehicle chargers, and photovoltaic technology.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A036) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A036) offered by Mr. Perry.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A036) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
